name: AMGEN INC., et al., petitioners, v. SANDOZ INC.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
AMGEN INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
SANDOZ INC.
attorneys: Motion of Apotex, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
casebody.head_matter:
AMGEN INC., et al., petitioners,
v.
SANDOZ INC.
No. 15-1195.
Supreme Court of the United States
Jan. 13, 2017.
Motion of Apotex, Inc., et al. for leave to file a brief as amici curiae granted. Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Federal Circuit granted. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
